summary: The diff implements the vast majority of requirements. All major pages (Home, Courses, CourseDetail, Checkout, ThankYou, Contact, Admin), backend actor with full CRUD, enrollment model, and visual theme are present. A few specific acceptance criteria details appear missing or ambiguous based on the truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend actor stores enrollment records in stable storage (persisted across upgrades)
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo uses Map.empty() for courses and enrollments without visible 'stable' keyword declarations, meaning data may not survive canister upgrades as required by REQ-5's 'persisted in stable storage' AC.

missing_requirements.requirement: getCourses, getCourse, addCourse, updateCourse, deleteCourse method names as specified
missing_requirements.reason: The backend exposes getAllCourses and createCourse rather than getCourses and addCourse as specified in the acceptance criteria. The method names do not exactly match the required API surface.

hallucinated_features.description: Search/filter functionality on the Courses page
hallucinated_features.reason: A search input with live filtering was added to the Courses page, but no such feature was requested in the build requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Stats bar on the Home page with hardcoded metrics
hallucinated_features.reason: A statistics bar section with Students Trained, Courses Available, Placement Rate, and Hiring Partners was added to the Home page, which was not requested in REQ-1.

hallucinated_features.description: Stats summary cards on the Admin Dashboard
hallucinated_features.reason: Dashboard statistics summary cards showing Total Courses, Total Enrollments, Pending Payments, and Paid Enrollments were added to the Admin page, which was not part of REQ-9.

InternetIdentityProvider, useInternetIdentity hook, and AuthClient integration are implemented and wrapped around the entire app, despite Internet Identity or user authentication being explicitly listed as a non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: getEnrollment single-enrollment lookup method on the backend
hallucinated_features.reason: A getEnrollment method for fetching a single enrollment by ID was implemented, which was not requested. Only createEnrollment and getEnrollments were required by REQ-5.
